name: bible-mcp_get_random_bible_verse
description:
Get a random Bible verse.

    Args:
        book_ids: Optional comma-separated list of book IDs (e.g., "GEN,JHN")
                 or special strings "OT" (Old Testament) or "NT" (New Testament)

    Returns:
        Random verse data including reference, text, and translation info

name: bible-mcp_get_bible_verse
description:
Get a specific Bible verse or passage.

    Args:
        reference: Bible reference (e.g., "John 3:16", "Genesis 1:1-3")
        translation: Translation identifier (default: "web" for World English Bible)

    Returns:
        Verse data including reference, text, and translation info

name: bible-mcp_list_bible_translations
description:
Get list of all available Bible translations.

    Returns:
        List of available translations with their identifiers and names

name: bible-mcp_list_bible_books
description:
Get list of books for a specific Bible translation.

    Args:
        translation: Translation identifier (default: "web")

    Returns:
        List of books with their identifiers and names

name: bible-mcp_list_bible_chapters
description:
Get chapters for a specific Bible book.

    Args:
        book: Book identifier (e.g., "JHN" for John, "GEN" for Genesis)
        translation: Translation identifier (default: "web")

    Returns:
        List of chapters for the specified book
